Package controllers

Class notification_error

java.lang.Object
controllers.notification_error
public class notification_error extends Object
Controller class for the notification_error.fxml file. Handles all user input and data manipulation for the notification view.
Author:
Arun Rai

  • Method Details

    • clickedOkbutton

      void clickedOkbutton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the pop up if user clicks "OK" button.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by clicking the "OK" button.

    • closeRequestHandler

      public void closeRequestHandler(javafx.stage.WindowEvent event)
      Closes the pop up if user clicks "X" at the top right of screen.
      Parameters:
      event - Clicking "X" on top right of window.

    • setDescriptionLabelForDeleteCustomerError

      public void setDescriptionLabelForDeleteCustomerError(List<Integer> listOfIntegers)
      Method is ran when user selects a customer from home page that has appointments and clicks "Delete Customer". Sets the error message for a customer with associated appointments that must be deleted before the customer can be deleted. Displays the IDs of the associated appointments.
      Parameters:
      listOfIntegers - List of Appointments belonging to a Customer that must be deleted first.

    • setDescriptionLabelForOverLappingAppointments

      public void setDescriptionLabelForOverLappingAppointments(Appointment appointment)
      Method is ran when user picks a time for a customer with an appointment during the same time. Sets the error message for a customer with overlapping appointments. Displays the ID, start time, and end time of the overlapping appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment object representing the conflicting appointment

    • setDescriptionLabelForAppointmentWithin15

      public void setDescriptionLabelForAppointmentWithin15(Appointment appointment)
      Method is ran when user successfully logs in and and their is an appointment within 15 minutes. Sets the message for an appointment that is scheduled within 15 minutes from the current time. Displays the ID, start time, and end time of the appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the Appointment object representing the appointment scheduled within 15 minutes

    • noUpComingAppointmnets

      public void noUpComingAppointmnets()
      Method is ran when user successfully logs in and and their is are no appointments within 15 minutes. Clears the content of the message.
